title: Peer Learning-Based Network Problem-Solving Workshop to Enhance Vaccination Program Education Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Experience operating basic vaccination programs and foundational knowledge of instructional design
context.additional_context: Emphasizing digital collaboration tools among learners and multinational case-based problem-solving activities

learning_goals: Learners can improve two types of vaccination program educational materials using peer feedback
Learners can derive solutions for three real-world problems using network-based collaborative tools.
Learners can implement one applicable educational strategy at their affiliated institution based on session outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
